sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; const Tariffs = ({ data, onDataChange, onNext, onBack }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ electricityTariffType: data.electricityTariffType || 'standard', electricityRate: data.electricityRate || '', electricityStandingCharge: data.electricityStandingCharge || '', gasTariffType: data.gasTariffType || 'standard', gasRate: data.gasRate || '', gasStandingCharge: data.gasStandingCharge || '', feedInTariffRate: data.feedInTariffRate || '', smartExportGuarantee: data.smartExportGuarantee || '', timeOfUseEnabled: data.timeOfUseEnabled || false, peakRate: data.peakRate || '', offPeakRate: data.offPeakRate || '', nightRate: data.nightRate || '', annualPriceIncrease: data.annualPriceIncrease || '3', electricitySupplier: data.electricitySupplier || '', gasSupplier: data.gasSupplier || '', hasGasSupply: data.hasGasSupply !== false, // Default to true ...data }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; const newValue = type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: newValue })); onDataChange({ [name]: newValue }); }; const handleNext = () => { // Basic validation - require main electricity rate if (formData.electricityRate) { onNext(); } }; const isFormValid = formData.electricityRate && parseFloat(formData.electricityRate) > 0; const majorSuppliers = [ 'British Gas', 'E.ON', 'EDF Energy', 'Npower', 'ScottishPower', 'SSE', 'Bulb', 'Octopus Energy', 'Avro Energy', 'Together Energy', 'Green Supplier Limited', 'Pure Planet', 'Shell Energy', 'So Energy', 'Utility Warehouse', 'Other' ]; const getCurrentElectricityInfo = () => { if (!formData.electricityRate) return "Please enter your current electricity rate"; const rate = parseFloat(formData.electricityRate); if (rate < 15) return "This rate seems low - please check it's in pence per kWh"; if (rate > 50) return "This rate seems high - renewable energy could provide significant savings"; if (rate >= 15 && rate <= 25) return "Standard rate - renewable energy will provide good savings"; if (rate > 25 && rate <= 35) return "Above average rate - excellent potential for renewable energy savings"; return "High rate - renewable energy systems will be very beneficial"; }; return (

Energy Tariffs

Configure your electricity and gas tariff details to calculate accurate savings and payback periods for your renewable energy system.

{/* Electricity Tariff Section */}

Electricity Tariff

{getCurrentElectricityInfo()}
{/* Time of Use Rates */} {formData.electricityTariffType === 'time-of-use' && (

Time of Use Rates

Usually 4pm-7pm weekdays
Usually 7pm-4pm
Usually 12am-7am
)}
{/* Gas Tariff Section */}

Gas Tariff

{formData.hasGasSupply && ( <>
Gas rates are typically 4-10p per kWh
)}
{/* Export Tariff Section */}

Export Tariffs

Rates you'll be paid for excess renewable energy exported to the grid

Legacy Feed-in Tariff for existing installations
Current SEG rates typically 3-7p per kWh
{/* Price Projections */}

Price Projections

This affects long-term savings calculations. Recent trends show 3-7% annual increases.
{/* Tariff Summary */} {isFormValid && (

Current Tariff Summary

Electricity Rate: {formData.electricityRate}p/kWh
{formData.electricityStandingCharge && (
Electricity Standing Charge: {formData.electricityStandingCharge}p/day
)} {formData.hasGasSupply && formData.gasRate && (
Gas Rate: {formData.gasRate}p/kWh
)} {formData.smartExportGuarantee && (
Export Rate (SEG): {formData.smartExportGuarantee}p/kWh
)}
Expected Annual Increase: {formData.annualPriceIncrease}%
)}
); }; export default Tariffs;
